body.name: EVERLIT 250 Pieces Survival First Aid Kit IFAK EMT Molle Pouch Survival Kit Outdoor Gear Emergency Kits Trauma Bag for Camping Boat Hunting Hiking Home Car Earthquake and Adventures

features: ✅【250 PCS First Aid Survival Kit, Meaningful and Cool Gifts Ideas for Families and Outdoorsman】Designed by army veterans and survivalists, the most compact and robust survival first aid kit contains essential first aid supplies and survival tools required for emergencies. Weighs only 2 Lbs, the kit is a must-have for your bug-out bag.

✅【Be Prepared for the Unexpected, Complete Comprehensive First Aid Essentials Exceeds OSHA Guidelines】The product includes more than enough med supplies to treat a single family under emergency circumstances. Perfect for taking care of any medical or emergency needs during outdoor wilderness adventures such as camping, backpacking, boy scouts, hiking, hunting and mountain biking.

✅【Molle EMT Pouch, Durable, Portable, and Water-Resistant】The military grade bag was made from 1000D water-resistant nylon, it offers three large compartments and many straps to get your supplies organized. The overall dimension of the kit is 8’’ x 6.5’’ x 5’’. The kit can be attached to any molle system: backpack, vest, vehicle molle panel.

✅【Top Quality Survival Gears Safeguard Your Next Adventure】Stuffed with the most essential survival gadgets: mylar space blanket, 3-mode tactical flashlight, multi-function paracord bracelet (compass, whistle), flintstone, knife, saber card, two 12 hour glow sticks and emergency rain poncho.

✅【All Weather, All Age, Multi-Purpose Survival Kit】From outdoor actions to general home and office needs, for the outdoorsman, preppers to boy scouts. With its comprehensive contents and coverage, you will be prepared anywhere you go.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 250 Pcs Essential First Aid Supplies and Survival Tools Including first aid supplies: bandages, wound dressings, gauze pads, alcohol pads, disinfection pads, trauma shears, sting relief pads, soap wipe, and more. Multi-Purpose, Ideal outdoor Camping, Home, Office, Vehicle Including practical survival gear: paracord bracelet, camping knife, glow sticks, tactical flashlight, flint, emergency poncho, and mylar blanket. Veteran-Owned Business, Built and Hand-Picked by Survivalists, Experts and Veterans The most compact and robust survival first aid kit on the market. Stuffed with a large collection of survival tools and medical supplies. You will be prepared before unexpected events hit.

WHY CHOOSE OUR KIT? EVERLIT Essential Survival First Aid Kit is the original Survival FAK introduced on the market. Designed by experts and veterans, and assembled in California, our product maintains the highest standard of quality and service. No more panic when help is out of reach, you will be well prepared with our fully stocked first aid kit. WHAT MAKES OUR KIT DIFFERENT? A total of 250 pcs of quality suppliesMulti-purpose: for home, office, travel, outdoor, roadside, and backpackingEasy to attach and carry BEST GIFT IDEA FOR YOUR LOVED ONES Preparing your loved ones is as important as being prepared. The kit will provide you and your family peace of mind in an emergency. This is a meaningful gift for your husband, brother, kids, wife, cousin on any occasion. SURVIVAL GEAR: 1 x Tactical EMT Molle Bag 1 x American Flag Patch 2 x Glow Stick (for 12 hours) 1 x Tactical Flashlight (Battery Not Included) 1 x Multi-Function Paracord Bracelet 1 x Multi-Function Tool Card 1 x Camping Knife 1 x Fire Starter 1 x Emergency Poncho 1 x Emergency Mylar Blanket FIRST AID SUPPLIES: 40 x Alcohol Wipe 1 x First Aid Tape 15 x Mini Bandage 40 x Adhesive Bandage 1 x Dressing 2 x Soap Wipe 80 x Cotton Tip 1 x Emergency Mylar Blanket 1 x Triangular Bandage 5 x Knuckle Bandage 1 x Shears 20 x Cotton Ball 5 x Butterfly Bandage 2 x PBT Bandage 3 x Sterile Gauze Pad 1 x CPR Mask 4 x Sting Relief Pad 1 x Metal Tweezers 2 Pair x Disposable Gloves 2 x Antiseptic Wipe 10 x Safety Pin 3 x Adhesive Wound Dressing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value, must have!
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with this kit! Looks even better in person, and I am loving the OG Green. The included items make this a great value and a very practical pack. You couldn’t buy the items separately for the cost of this - and there is still room to add some of your own items. Several ways to carry the kit or secure it to yourself, or even hang it when in use. The bag is sturdy and made of quality material. It does not feel cheap and the stitching and zippers feel durable. No weird smells, just perfection! Super pleased with this purchase and would definitely buy it again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect and compact. Highly recommend.
reviews.reviewText: What’s in the bag.Although I don’t like the survival gear because I already have those essentials, this kit is fantastic. I believe this kit is necessary if you’re an outdoors person or hunt/shoot. of course I recommend you add/remove some things: remove or replace the knife, replace the tweezers with better ones, remove the flashlight, and remove any survival gear (except for 1 glow stick) to make room for more medical supplies but keep the gear because it’s still good. Medical supplies I think are necessary but not included; some more sterile gauze and a tourniquet. You should have some extra room for more bleed control or specialized trauma treatment. Highly recommend researching the most common types of trauma you will face for whatever you do and find the proper supplies. If you’re a frequent shooter include some chest seal and focus on bleed control but don’t just take my word for it, be thorough as it could save a life.The bag itself.The bag is of great quality, materials are pretty good and the inside of the bag has some elastic straps and pockets to organize your items. The rip away Velcro system is fantastic, the Molle system is up to standard and isn’t just for show. With some organizing you can set up your bag so when you open it up you can shake it upside down and NOTHING will fall out. I secure my tourniquet with a Velcro strap (neither are included) by using the elastic bands inside the pouch so it’s quick to get out but still secure.Conclusion and final notes.The survival gear is of meh quality but it will work, the trauma shears work great, tested them on a work shirt and it cut through the thick fabric. The thermal blanket is necessary, if you’re treating someone they’re gonna want a blanket and if they’re in shock from blood loss it is necessary they keep their body heat. Can also work as a shelter. Although I removed most of the survival gear I keep the thermal blanket and water resistant poncho, they are small and light. What comes in the bag is pretty thorough and good quality for the price.This kit is 10/10 for quality, 10/10 for the bag features and 9/10 for the contents of everything, points off for no tourniquet but that’s my opinion.TL:DRIt’s a great kit, if you want medical supplies to take anywhere with you this kit will work great.It’s got great quality all around and some features I really like. Do your research and include things you feel are necessary but be thorough.I’ll upload a video and some pictures soon showing my setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This IFAK is awesome! I was looking for something that I could buy and customize for my travel kit. This comes jam packed with goodies! I did customize it a little to what I need, but this comes so well stocked and with such diverse contents! I added a few things that I prefer and thinned it out a little, but it now goes on all my trips with me and has been used quite a bit. It's sturdy, and has ample supplies. I would highly recommend this for your travel medical needs. I use it on camping trips with the family, drill with the military, and keep it in my truck in the event a bystander needs it. Get prepared, be helpful and live life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for emergencies but bad quality
reviews.reviewText: I like that the med kit comes with a lot of things I may need during an emergency and I love the way it looks. But as others have mentioned, one of the buckles broke during my first use. I have reached out to the company but it’s been about a month since I last heard anything. Hoping for some resolution because I really like it.Update: After reaching again to the company, they did send me a brand new one to replace my broken one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, Essential gear
reviews.reviewText: [ex military first responder here]This first aid pack is very well thought out and put together. The bag itself is well designed and constructed - it has straps for nearly any application or storage with super strong synthetic fabric, webbed belts, and Velcro. It should last a good long time.Obviously I've not opened every packet or tried to "test" all the contents, but looking everything over gives me confidence that we'll be well prepared for just about anything we might encounter on the road or elsewhere. The items included are sensible and appear to be of high quality. I feel more comfortable having this and a good fire extinguisher in our car.I do recommend this kit (or something similar) to everyone, as a part of one's essential safety gear. You'll be glad you have it when someone needs it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy one per person.
reviews.reviewText: Amazingly good survival gear, the flashlight and knife, durable kit. Lot of med supplies for an emergency, just in case someone needs it. Hopefully not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The kit is a great kit for most every emergency to deal with while out and about on trials and camping . I was really surprised by the quality of the products . They could have added more larger band aids but it’s a great kit. I wouldn’t leave without it . Great for trucks and cars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great 1st Aid kit, better to have it and not need it.
reviews.reviewText: I'm an ex-Cop, Security Professional, ARMY Combat Lifesaver trained. While I'm not trying to save the world anymore, I was looking for a good, solid First Aid kit to build on what I already had. I keep a crate of First Responder stuff in the back of my old JEEP Cherokee and this Kit is a solid batch of neccessary items. At least with the big Red Cross 1st Aid emblem on it, I can tell someone to get my Med Kit and they'll be able to figure it out. Solid investment.
